comment: One of the most inspiring and motivating professors. She will encourage you to always want to do and be better as a student. One of my favorite professors ever!!

Whiddon taught a nursing elective in Neurosurgery. Classes were very easy, usually a guest speaker, then one powerpoint. You're graded based on 2 papers that reflect 2 different surgeries you shadow, a paper based off a movie displaying a neuro disorder, and a group project. As long as you show effort and follow the grading rubrics you'll succeed.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things
